clinical_study.brief_title: Characterization of the Plasma Proteome Following Left Ventricular Assist Device Implantation
clinical_study.official_title: Characterization of the Plasma Proteome Following Left Ventricular Assist Device Implantation

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to characterize changes in the plasma proteome over time following left ventricular assist device (LVAD) implantation.

primary_outcome.measure: Quantitative differences in plasma protein abundance

biospec_descr.textblock: Change in plasma proteins. [Time Frame, Days 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, and 180 post-LVAD implantation][Designated as safety issue: No]

study_pop.textblock: Study participants will be recruited from the University of Colorado Hospital Advanced Heart Failure Program.
